title: Summer Art Camp! 5 Days of Artists and Painting Monet, Van Gogh, Maisse, & More
name: Kimberly R Moseler
shortDescription: In this 5 day class we will explore artists Monet, Matisse, Van Gogh, among others and then recreate painntings using crayon and watercolor. Students will have fun learning about the artists & creating their own art inspired by their work.
